subject: Fix verification procedure
commitMessage:
Fix verification procedure

Fixed verification error in case of signing distributor certificate and
then verifying if both signature*.xml and author-signature.xml are present

Change-Id: I1fbc90d0c25490b8be7488424270920351aca8b2
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Andreev <s.andreev@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

What the problem with verification?

subject: Fix case when signing with already existed author-signature.xml and signature*.xml files
commitMessage:
Fix case when signing with already existed author-signature.xml and signature*.xml files

Signing directory with already existed author-signature.xml and signature*.xml files
leads to error on a package installation stage.

Change-Id: I4f1898f8a44818b7694bbac3ee55b360a6daa4d9
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Andreev <s.andreev@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(2 comments)

You should use absolute path when you are trying to call some command line utils in a script.

Patch Set 1:

For what absolute path??

Patch Set 1:

Please use type command.
For example, "/bin/rm"

Patch Set 1:

What are the arguments for using absolute path? Everywhere used commands without path, e.g. in validate-widget.sh line 42, 43:
    mkdir -p $wgtdir
    unzip -q "$1" -d $wgtdir
